p:
Patients 2 and 3, a husband and wife couple from Zhejiang, China, were also confirmed to have the disease on January 25 and 27. Similar to Patient 1, the couple had no history of epidemiological contact. According to a video from the District Public Security Department, on the afternoon of January 22, Patient 2 and a confirmed individual were at the same clinic for 50â€‰seconds, where both of them did not wear masks.
